subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic was seeded No. 1 for Wimbledon on Wednesday despite being No. 2 in the world behind Rafael Nadal, who was seeded second.
snippet: Novak Djokovic was seeded No. 1 for Wimbledon on Wednesday despite being No. 2 in the world behind Rafael Nadal, who was seeded second.
